Index.meta_title: Fecstatic - Easy to use Advanced SaaS Template.

Navbar.description: An advance template for your SaaS business, built with TypeScript, Shadcn UI, Tailwind CSS, Prisma, and more.

Hero.title: Build SaaS Faster!
Hero.description: An advance template for your SaaS business, built with TypeScript, Shadcn UI, Tailwind CSS, Prisma, and more.

TechStack.section_description: Use a modern and powerful tech stack for your SaaS business.
TechStack.feature1_description: A utility-first CSS framework that can be composed directly in your markup.
TechStack.feature2_description: A collection of UI components with best principle components.
TechStack.feature3_description: A pluggable linting tool to analyzes code to quickly find problems
TechStack.feature4_description: An opinionated code formatter to enforce consistent code style
TechStack.feature5_description: A Next Gen ORM that help developers build faster and fewer errors
TechStack.feature6_description: A pre-commit hook that runs on every commit to enforce best practices
TechStack.feature7_description: A crash monitoring and error reporting solution
TechStack.feature8_description: A testing framework for JavaScript and TypeScript
TechStack.feature9_description: A multi language localization tool for easier translation
TechStack.feature10_description: A containerization tool for all environment deployment
TechStack.feature11_description: A schema validation tool for runtime typesafe validation
TechStack.feature12_description: A testing tool scenario for continuous integration
TechStack.feature13_description: A data collection tool for analytics and insights
TechStack.feature14_description: A lint tool for increase application performance

Overview.section_description: An outline of Fecstatic core features.
Overview.save_time_description: Build startup in a day, not a month.
Overview.integrations_description: Integrated with many popular tools and services.
Overview.247_support_description: We are available a 100% of the time.
Overview.best_practices_description: Hardcoded with best practices big company architecture, easy to scale but easy to use for you.
